title: Visa denial notices
dataVerified: Full name, case number, denial reason/INA section, denial date, consular officer
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake denial notices. Domain binding verifies embassy/USCIS. Appeal/waiver documentation. 214(b)/221(g) verification. Reapplication planning. Prevents denial fraud. For privacy, issuers can add a random salt line to raise entropy and defeat guessing attacks.
